author: scottwilson
msg: Added some big sexy GDL-licensed icons for the default widgets

author: scottwilson
msg: Added a "all=true" switch to return all widgets, rather than just the defaults. Used in conjunction with choosing widgets by id rather than by type.

author: scottwilson
msg: Added widget GUID to the SharedData table, to segregate shared storage (no sharing between different widgets even in the same space)

author: scottwilson
msg: Added support for instantiating widgets by GUID as well as by TYPE, and segregated the shared data areas for widgets by GUID as well as SHARED DATA KEY.
